report.title: My Great Trip
report.author: Experienced_Tripper
report.bodytext: The reason I am writing this is because back in Febuary 2002 I /n decided to experiement with Morning Glory seeds. I accidentally /n came upon this website and actually researched the seeds before /n trying them. You guys gave me so much good information that I /n decided I should give back. /n /n Here's how it all happened for me. On 1 afternoon I went up to /n the local K-Mart to look for MG:HB seeds. While in there I found /n Martha Stewart brand MG:HB seeds. I proceeded to buy 4 packs /n (6grams, roughly 240 seeds). Then I came home and prepared the /n seeds. I washed them with dish washer soap, then dryed them on a /n paper towel, then ground them up in a coffee grinder. /n /n At 9pm I poured the seeds into a cup of water. Then drank the /n potion and ate the remaining chunks of seeds. It was pretty /n nasty but definetly wasn't that bad. At about 20 minutes the /n effects started to kick in. But these were mild effects. Also /n though, my stomach started to hurt and my limbs became very /n heavy. So i drank some pepto to help my stomach. At about 1 hour /n the effects really started to kick. And once the trip began to /n take over all stomach pain just left. At 1st I began to think of /n it as just a mild acid trip, which I was happy with. It wasn't /n untill about 2 or 3 hours into it that the MG trip REALLY began /n to kick hard. Then it felt exactly like an acid trip. Walls were /n rolling and breathing. When i walked around the house the floor /n began to slant. It felt like the world was tilted. Once I turned /n the kitchen light on I was very light senstive. It felt as if /n everything was glowing around me. Best way to describe it is, /n imagine walking out into the street in the middle of the night, /n standing directly under a street light, you can feel the light /n beaming down on you. Honestly, the peak lasted from about 11pm /n to 5am. It was very intense and lasted for a very long time. and /n i mean peaking, I'm not counting the 'afterglow', which as /n everyone knows goes on for many hours after the peak is gone. /n /n In conclusion, I highly recommend it, it was fantastic. I've /n read many negative reports on here, and I've come to many /n conclusions. Maybe they had to low a dosage, got bad seeds, or /n weakened the seeds during the extraction process. My advice, /n get at least 6grams, clean them, dry them, grind them, drink /n them. And don't forget the pepto.
